page.title: 16 Housing
page.content: There has been very little house building in the surrounding countryside of our grid block,perhaps minor improvements to farm buildings but no major housing development. There are many more houses now in the small part of our area near Quaperlake Street than there were in the past.The age of this housing varies tremendously,from the earlier part of this century (or earlier)to the present day. There is also variety in the type of housing,detached,semi-detached,terrace d,private and council owned properties are all in evidence. A new,small development has almost been completed opposite the Unionist Club.
